summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (23 ties). Key relationship types: acquaintance, family.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (23), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (17), Sonia Marmeladov (15), Katerina Ivanovna (14)
story_summary: Svidrigailov spent the evening visiting low haunts, where he interacted with Katia and some clerks before heading to a pleasure garden. After resolving a dispute over a stolen teaspoon, he returned home, drenched from a sudden storm. He visited Sonia, offering her bonds for her family and expressing concern for Rodion's fate. Afterward, he made an unexpected visit to his betrothed's parents, gifting her a substantial sum of money before leaving.
